set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL_LHOLT (ID, FOODBANKTXHEADERID, FOODITEMID, FOODITEMAMOUNT, QUANTITY, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @FOODBANKTXHEADERID, @FOODITEMID, @FOODITEMAMOUNT, @QUANTITY, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE) end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
